original_text: You may take the young birds for yourself. But you must let the mother bird go free. If you do that, everything will be well with you. You will have a long life.
korean_text: 어미는 반드시 놓아 줄 것이요 새끼는 취하여도 되나니 그리하면 네가 복을 누리고 장수하리라

sentences.original_text: You may take the young birds for yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 새끼를 너를 위해 가져도 된다

sentences.original_text: But you must let the mother bird go free
everything will be well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 것이 너에게 잘 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have a long life
